content: What fashion designer founded a namesake company in 1981 and is known for his signature red-soled shoes?

I believe you're referring to Christian Louboutin. He is a French fashion designer who founded his eponymous company in 1991, not 1981. He is renowned worldwide for his luxurious footwear, particularly for the distinctive red-soled shoes that have become his signature. These shoes are highly coveted and have been worn by numerous celebrities and fashion icons. If you have any other questions or need more information, feel free to ask!
